short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly copy your frequently used links like LinkedIn, GitHub, and portfolio by saving them once.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

Tired of juggling multiple links during job applications, projects, or daily tasks? Meet LinkQuick, the ultimate link management tool that simplifies your workflow.

Features:

• Organized Link Storage: Save links with a custom name and URL for easy reference.
• One-Click Copy: Quickly copy links to your clipboard without hassle.
• Streamlined Management: Delete outdated links with a single click.
• Minimalist Design: Enjoy a clean, distraction-free interface tailored for efficiency.
• Seamless User Experience: Smooth functionality with intuitive controls for effortless navigation.

Why Choose LinkQuick? 
Perfect for professionals, students, and anyone who works with multiple links daily. Save time, stay organized, and never lose an important link again.

How It Works:

1. Click the “Add New Item” button to save a link.
2. Enter a custom name and URL for the link.
3. View, copy, or delete links directly from the extension.

Try LinkQuick today and transform the way you manage links!
